pkgmetadata.longdescription: A DNA Reference Library Manager // Reference database manager offering a set of functions to import, organize, clean, filter, audit and export reference genetic data. Provide functions to download sequence data from Bold Systems (https://www.boldsystems.org/) and NCBI GenBank https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank/. Designed as an environment for semi-automatic and assisted construction of reference databases and to improve standardization and repeatability in barcoding and metabarcoding studies.
